t: Hear*pn my prayer, O Lord,*s Give*ln ear to my supplications! Answer*ln me in Your faithfulness, in Your righteousness!
And*ln do not enter into judgment with Your servant, For*ln in Your sight no man living is righteous.
For*ln the enemy has persecuted my soul; He*ln has crushed my life to the ground; He*ln has made me dwell in dark places, like those who have long been dead.
Therefore*ln my spirit is overwhelmed within me; My*ln heart is appalled within me.
I*ln remember the days of old; I*ln meditate on all Your doings; I*ln muse on the work of Your hands.
I*ln stretch out my hands to You; My*ln soul longs*i for You, as a parched land. Selah.
Answer*ln me quickly, O Lord,*s my spirit fails; Do*ln not hide Your face from me, Or*ln I will become like those who go down to the pit.
Let*ln me hear Your lovingkindness in the morning; For*ln I trust in You; Teach*ln me the way in which I should walk; For*ln to You I lift up my soul.
Deliver*ln me, O Lord,*s from my enemies; I*ln take refuge in You.
Teach*ln me to do Your will, For*ln You are my God; Let*ln Your good Spirit lead me on level ground.
For*ln the sake of Your name, O Lord,*s revive me. In*ln Your righteousness bring my soul out of trouble.
And*ln in Your lovingkindness, cut off my enemies And*ln destroy all those who afflict my soul, For*ln I am Your servant.
